role_description: An Ansible role that installs and configures Guacamole for remote desktops inside a browser
role_description_full_overview: [Apache Guacamole](https://guacamole.apache.org/) is a clientless remote desktop gateway. It supports standard protocols like VNC, RDP, and SSH.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs and configures Guacamole for remote desktops inside a browser.
